short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows Shopify users to export a order to CSV file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool helps Shopify users export an order header details from the admin page. With just one click you can get a csv file with the order header fields. To keep the exports unique each export file name is base on the order id.
